summary: Improves the quality of loading screen Alduin, not the Alduin we see in general.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This is improved load screen Alduin texture.
[/size][size=3]This texture only replaces load screen texture, not the Alduin we see in general.
This is nothing more than normal map difference. See how that effects?[/size]
[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?
[/size][/color][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatic: Manager should do the magic.
Manual: Drag it to your data folder.[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][img]http://i.imgur.com/P5sHlxI.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/0N2hcAQ.png[/img][/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
